name: Crazy Tire - Reach the Moon
description:
Best game of 2022!!!

Use amazing wheels to crush everything on your way!
Improve the power of your tire to make it spin faster than light.
They cannot stop you from rolling! No engine or clutch needed here, be prepared to squeeze, and destroy them all!
Smashing the wall at the end of the levels is your objective, the stronger your tire gets the longer you will be spinning.

Wheel you be able to reach the moon?!
